description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In a distant galaxy, an alien race is at war with itself. Take command of a squad of alien 'tracker' units in an attempt to thwart the plan to invade earth, in this turn-based game of strategic warfare. With multiple weapons and dozens of unit and weapon upgrades, do you have what it takes to defeat a foe with vastly superior numbers?!
description.short: In a distant galaxy, an alien race is at war with itself. Take command of a squad of alien 'tracker' units in an attempt to thwart the plan to invade earth, in this turn-based game of strategic warfare. With multiple weapons and dozens of unit and weapon upgrades, do you have what it takes to defeat a foe with vastly superior numbers?!
